alert.note: Alert for Henry; Patrick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 11:58AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Henry and northeastern Patrick Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1158 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Critz, or 7 miles northeast of Stuart, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spencer... Bassett... Sanville... Critz... Philpott Dam... Charity... and Penns Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
